attributes.action: Issue an apology to Damian Green and to the people of Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MP Damian Green was arrested and subjected to a search of his private property by anti-terrorism police.

Opposition politicians have a duty to hold the government to account and reveal to the public information that is in the public interest.

The arrest of Mr.Green is an affront to democracy and an affront to the will of the people who voted Mr.Green into his position to serve their best interests.

The office of the Prime Minister must accept responsibility for this scandalous incident and insure it does not happen again.

It is therefore essential that the Prime Ministers office issue an apology forthwith for this outrageous act against parliamentary democracy and the representatives of the people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
